author: Tom Bennet
title: How secure is your Bitcoin wallet's mnemonic seed phrase?
description: What makes your Bitcoin wallet's seed phrase secure? Explore entropy, checksums, and BIP39 in this hands-on, interactive guide to mnemonic generation.
content:
Your Bitcoin wallets security boils down to a list of random words. But how random is random? And how hard would it be for someone to guess your seed phrase?
